rescuecore2.messages

Interface MessageComponent

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractMessageComponent, ChangeSetComponent, CommandListComponent, ConfigComponent, EntityComponent, EntityIDComponent, EntityIDListComponent, EntityListComponent, IntComponent, IntListComponent, RawDataComponent, StringComponent, StringListComponent

    public interface MessageComponent
    A piece of a message.
